questions.question: In "Caillou's Holiday Movie", why is Caillou got upset?

choices.answer: Doris told him to clean his room up
He wants to help Daddy shovel snow

questions.resources: Daddy told him he has to eat breakfast first.

questions.question: In the episode "Rosie Bothers Caillou", why is Rosie crying?
questions.resources: Correct! Caillou shoves Rosie out of his room and wants to ban her from coming to his room.

imageMetadata.resources: Correct! Caillou shoves Rosie out of his room and wants to ban her from coming to his room.

questions.question: Who drops by for an unexpected visit just before the opening theme song?

choices.answer: Because Caillou and Leo's behavior was bad
Because Caillou and Leo tells Clementine to shut up
Because parenting groups found the word stupid

questions.question: Why did "Caillou's Crossword" got banned?
questions.resources: That episode was banned because parenting groups found the word stupid just like the skateboarder.

questions.resources: There are 12 windows on the calendar.
